info.short_description: Welcome to your niu world ! ğŸ’— We are a cute and loving international community ï¼¯(â‰§â–½â‰¦)ï¼¯ !
info.full_description:
We are a moderated instance, that aren't supporting harassment nor hateful speech, so what set us apart? Well, unlike many instances like us, we won't prevent you to interact with instances that aren't respecting our rules.
The main language used here is English, but for most of us this isn't our main language, so it's a great place to learn! 

Here, we are open to any subjects, but the main ones are:
- Fictions / Animes / Mangas / Comics
- Gaming / e-Sport / Retro / Speedrun
- Programming / Security / IT stuffs
- Sometime politics / World events
- Pictures and story from around the world <3 

If you want more infos, visit our instance ^-^ !

info.short_description: Gaming without the 'gate
info.full_description: Elekk is a Mastodon instance for games of any type - from chess to World of Warcraft. We are explicitly feminist and inclusionary, and reject Gamergate and the culture that spawned it.

info.short_description: This instance is for people interested in development.
info.full_description:
This instance is for people interested in development.
But, discussions aren't limited to development!

info.short_description: We are an instance that tries its best to be as welcoming and friendly as possible! Here you can find all kinds of discussion, whether it is anime, te
info.full_description:
Our instance is a place for you to relax and chat. We want you to enjoy yourself and meet new people that you can connect with. We concentrate on making our instance special for what it is -
Open.

This is because we strive to make our instance open to everyone and hope that everyone can connect and meet new people to chat with. Whether you post cute anime pictures, discuss politics, hobbies, or what you did yesterday!

Have fun and please do not post content that breaks international law. Actually, we highly suggest that you do not break the international law.

info.short_description: Mastodon for amateur game makers, and people interested in playing and thinking about amateur games.
info.full_description:
Hi! I hope Game Making Social is a cosey, friendly place to talk and share stuff about amateur videogame making and everything surrounding that. It's kinda an offshoot of Game Making Tools, which is a wiki(+) for a similar audience.

Game makers, game writers, game players most welcome! Unless you're a jerk!!

Please read the rules before signing-up :)

info.short_description: A place for creative folks to interact without all the noise.
info.full_description:
Social @ Play Vicious is the social media component of the forth coming fourth version (ha) of Play Vicious. While Play Vicious itself will be a platform for content and consumables, interaction with said content will be handled by Social. Think of it as a federated media site that will work in cohesion with it's own social media installation.

I know. I think it's pretty cool too.

info.short_description: General purpose social network with a focus on anime and socialism.
info.full_description: Anime is great.

info.short_description: This instance is primary about programming, EBM/Industrial music and videogames. But feel free to talk about whatever you want.
info.full_description:
Terms of use
Be polite to the others
Use NSFW for offending stuff
Don't write things that are against the laws of Czech republic

info.short_description: Micro-blogging site operated by Mark Shane Hayden of Coalesco Digital Systems Inc. We are located in Alberta, Canada.
info.full_description: This is NOT intended to be a commercial/promotional site! Registration is open to anyone interested in civil discussions on any interesting topic--especially technology, current events and politics.

info.short_description: Computer gaming centric mastodon instance
info.full_description: Fans of all computer games are welcome here, whether you're a casual gamer or a hardcore esports fan!
